pullrequest.title: Refactor the artifact validator to operate on the world SDF file

content.raw:
Correct, this drops the `scan` service for scanning through levels, as it is no longer required.

It also adds `/artifact/prev` to go back one artifact and `/artifact/move_to` to jump to a specific artifact.

See documentation here: [#!/osrf/subt/pull-requests/397/refactor-the-artifact-validator-to-operate#Lsubt\_ign/src/ArtifactValidator.ccT18](#!/osrf/subt/pull-requests/397/refactor-the-artifact-validator-to-operate#Lsubt_ign/src/ArtifactValidator.ccT18)
content.html:
Correct, this drops the scan service for scanning through levels, as it is no longer required.

It also adds /artifact/prev to go back one artifact and /artifact/move_to to jump to a specific artifact.

See documentation here: #!/osrf/subt/pull-requests/397/refactor-the-artifact-validator-to-operate#Lsubt_ign/src/ArtifactValidator.ccT18
